message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only pay $10,000 for it. This aligns better with my budget. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down a bit to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's find a middle ground!
